name: Deity of Jigsaw Puzzle (Ludum Dare 50)
description:
Deity of Jigsaw Puzzle | 

A puzzle game where jigsaw puzzle pieces can be arranged to gain temporal abilities and shield the player from damage.

At the beginning of each day (i.e. after each movement), the durability of all equipped puzzle pieces will decrease by 1. If zero puzzle pieces are equipped, the player’s health will be deducted instead.

All newly placed pieces can be rearranged and must be connected to the center piece in order to proceed. Afterward, those pieces will be locked and could not be moved.

Only pieces that are connected to the center piece are active. Reconnect disjointed pieces with the center piece to reactivate them.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

R - Restart
